nodes.beat: Little Red, a young Roman girl, receives a message from her ailing grandmother.
Grandmother requests Little Red to bring her some medicinal herbs from the local market.
Little Red, wearing her red hooded cloak, ventures out with her horse-drawn chariot.
En route, Little Red encounters a stranger, a cunning gladiator, who learns about her mission.
The gladiator misdirects Little Red to a dangerous part of the city.
Little Red realizes the trick and seeks help from the local legionaries.
The legionaries apprehend the gladiator and Little Red continues her journey to her grandmother's house.
Little Red delivers the herbs and they spend the evening enjoying a traditional Roman feast.
Grandmother asks Little Red to bring her a special amulet from the temple.
The gladiator attempts to steal the amulet from Little Red.
Little Red, showing courage, manages to escape and reports the gladiator to the temple priests.
The priests curse the gladiator and Little Red safely delivers the amulet to her grandmother.
Little Red, a promising young scribe, decides to visit her grandmother and write about her life.
Little Red's journey attracts the attention of a jealous rival scribe.
The rival scribe tries to sabotage Little Red's chariot.
Little Red, being observant, notices the sabotage and repairs her chariot.
Little Red exposes the rival scribe to the local authorities and continues her journey to her grandmother's house.
The rival scribe tries to steal Little Red's writings.
Little Red, being clever, manages to safeguard her writings and exposes the rival scribe to the local authorities.
Little Red buys the amulet and delivers it to her grandmother.

outputs.options:

Starts: 1,

Storylines: 4, 
Settings: AncientRome
